<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D"></a>

# AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D

**Inherits:** [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md) **\<** [AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A set of [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md)\\ s placed on 2D coordinates, crossfading between the three adjacent ones. Used by [AnimationTree](AnimationTree.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A resource used by [AnimationNodeBlendTree](AnimationNodeBlendTree.md).

\ **AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D** represents a virtual 2D space on which [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md)\\ s are placed. Outputs the linear blend of the three adjacent animations using a [Vector2](Vector2.md) weight. Adjacent in this context means the three [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md)\\ s making up the triangle that contains the current value.

You can add vertices to the blend space with [add_blend_point()](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_add_blend_point) and automatically triangulate it by setting [auto_triangles](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_property_auto_triangles) to ``true``. Otherwise, use [add_triangle()](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_add_triangle) and [remove_triangle()](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_remove_triangle) to triangulate the blend space by hand.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Using AnimationTree](../tutorials/animation/animation_tree.md)

- [Third Person Shooter (TPS) Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2710)

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_signal_triangles_updated"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**triangles_updated**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_signal_triangles_updated)

Emitted every time the blend space's triangles are created, removed, or when one of their vertices changes position.

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_BlendMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **BlendMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_BlendMode)

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_constant_BLEND_MODE_INTERPOLATED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BlendMode](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md#enum_AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_BlendMode) **BLEND_MODE_INTERPOLATED** = `0`

The interpolation between animations is linear.<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_constant_BLEND_MODE_DISCRETE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BlendMode](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md#enum_AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_BlendMode) **BLEND_MODE_DISCRETE** = `1`

The blend space plays the animation of the animation node which blending position is closest to. Useful for frame-by-frame 2D animations.<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_constant_BLEND_MODE_DISCRETE_CARRY"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BlendMode](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md#enum_AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_BlendMode) **BLEND_MODE_DISCRETE_CARRY** = `2`

Similar to [BLEND_MODE_DISCRETE](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_constant_BLEND_MODE_DISCRETE), but starts the new animation at the last animation's playback position.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_property_auto_triangles"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **auto_triangles** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_property_auto_triangles)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_auto_triangles**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_auto_triangles**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the blend space is triangulated automatically. The mesh updates every time you add or remove points with [add_blend_point()](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_add_blend_point) and [remove_blend_point()](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_remove_blend_point).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_property_blend_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[BlendMode](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md#enum_AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_BlendMode) **blend_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_property_blend_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_blend_mode**\ (\ value\: [BlendMode](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md#enum_AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_BlendMode)\ )
- [BlendMode](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md#enum_AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_BlendMode) **get_blend_mode**\ (\ )

Controls the interpolation between animations.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_property_max_space"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **max_space** = `Vector2(1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_property_max_space)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_max_space**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_max_space**\ (\ )

The blend space's X and Y axes' upper limit for the points' position. See [add_blend_point()](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_add_blend_point).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_property_min_space"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **min_space** = `Vector2(-1, -1)` [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_property_min_space)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_min_space**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_min_space**\ (\ )

The blend space's X and Y axes' lower limit for the points' position. See [add_blend_point()](AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D.md#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_add_blend_point).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_property_snap"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **snap** = `Vector2(0.1, 0.1)` [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_property_snap)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_snap**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_snap**\ (\ )

Position increment to snap to when moving a point.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_property_sync"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **sync** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_property_sync)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_use_sync**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_using_sync**\ (\ )

If ``false``, the blended animations' frame are stopped when the blend value is ``0``.

If ``true``, forcing the blended animations to advance frame.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

- [String](String.md) **get_x_label**\ (\ )

- [String](String.md) **get_y_label**\ (\ )

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_add_blend_point"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_blend_point**\ (\ node\: [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md), pos\: [Vector2](Vector2.md), at_index\: [int](int.md) = -1\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_add_blend_point)

Adds a new point that represents a `node` at the position set by `pos`. You can insert it at a specific index using the `at_index` argument. If you use the default value for `at_index`, the point is inserted at the end of the blend points array.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_add_triangle"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_triangle**\ (\ x\: [int](int.md), y\: [int](int.md), z\: [int](int.md), at_index\: [int](int.md) = -1\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_add_triangle)

Creates a new triangle using three points `x`, `y`, and `z`. Triangles can overlap. You can insert the triangle at a specific index using the `at_index` argument. If you use the default value for `at_index`, the point is inserted at the end of the blend points array.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_get_blend_point_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_blend_point_count**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_get_blend_point_count)

Returns the number of points in the blend space.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_get_blend_point_node"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md) **get_blend_point_node**\ (\ point\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_get_blend_point_node)

Returns the [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md) referenced by the point at index `point`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_get_blend_point_position"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_blend_point_position**\ (\ point\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_get_blend_point_position)

Returns the position of the point at index `point`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_get_triangle_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_triangle_count**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_get_triangle_count)

Returns the number of triangles in the blend space.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_get_triangle_point"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_triangle_point**\ (\ triangle\: [int](int.md), point\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_get_triangle_point)

Returns the position of the point at index `point` in the triangle of index `triangle`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_remove_blend_point"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_blend_point**\ (\ point\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_remove_blend_point)

Removes the point at index `point` from the blend space.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_remove_triangle"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_triangle**\ (\ triangle\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_remove_triangle)

Removes the triangle at index `triangle` from the blend space.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_set_blend_point_node"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_blend_point_node**\ (\ point\: [int](int.md), node\: [AnimationRootNode](AnimationRootNode.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationNodeBlendSpace2D_method_set_blend_point_node)

Changes the [AnimationNode](AnimationNode.md) referenced by the point at index `point`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<!-- classref-method -->

Updates the position of the point at index `point` in the blend space.
